snippet.title: Monster Sanctuary - Early Access Launch Date Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Wishlist and Free Demo: http://bit.ly/MonsterSanctuarySteam

Launching August 28th on Steam Early Access, Monster Sanctuary takes you to a metroidvania world where you'll discover, hatch, train and battle a wide variety of monsters.

Take advantage of branching upgrade trees to grow your monsters around your own playstyle, use their unique skills to unlock new areas of the map and work together to become the ultimate Monster Keeper!

Official website: https://monster-sanctuary.com/
Follow Monster Sanctuary on Twitter: https://twitter.com/moi_rai_
Follow Monster Sanctuary on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterSanctuaryGame/
Join the Monster Sanctuary Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/C9T7Ven

Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 
bit.ly/SubTeam17
